Package client

Class RandomClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.RandomClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class RandomClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Random move client for the Kalaha game server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RandomClient()
      Creates a new random move client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addText​(java.lang.String txt)
      Adds a text string to the GUI textarea.
      int getRandom()
      Returns a random ambo number (1-6) used when making a random move.
      void run()
      Thread for server communication.
      void start()
      Starts the client thread.

    • Method Detail

        public void start()
        Starts the client thread.

      • addText

        public void addText​(java.lang.String txt)
        Adds a text string to the GUI textarea.
        Parameters:
        txt - The text to add

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread for server communication. Checks when it is this client's turn to make a move, and then makes a random move.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getRandom

        public int getRandom()
        Returns a random ambo number (1-6) used when making a random move.
        Returns:
        Random ambo number
